name: mresspw

stmt.origin: simp1bi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c0))))
stmt.pretty: simp1bi(c0 ∈(Moore ` c1), c0 ⊆ P(c1), c1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(c0),(hs0 ≠ ∅ → ⋂ hs0 ∈ c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cpw(c1)), wcel(c1, c0), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wne(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cint(cv(hs0)), c0)))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(Moore ` c1)→ c0 ⊆ P(c1))
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cmre, c1)), wss(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

comment: A Moore collection is a subset of the power of the base set; each closed subset of the system is actually a subset of the base. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
